team.name: Manank Patel
team.description: With a strong foundation in civil engineering, Manank brings technical precision and structural expertise to every project. His engineering background ensures that all designs are not only aesthetically pleasing but also structurally sound and compliant with safety standards.

team.name: Michelle Chokshi
team.description: Michelle combines her architectural design expertise with master planning knowledge to create holistic design solutions. Her qualifications from the Council of Architecture and Institute of Town Planners ensure comprehensive spatial planning and design excellence.

certifications: Institute of Town Planners India (ITPI) Member
